thread.title: REVEALED: Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah did not cost Kotoko GHC100,000
thread.title_full: REVEALED: Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah did not cost Kotoko GHC100,000

title: REVEALED: Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah did not cost Kotoko GHC100,000
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 23:25 CET REVEALED: Goalkeeper Ernest Sowah did not cost Kotoko GHC100,000 Ernest Sowah 
By: Sheikh Tophic Sienu @desheikh1 on twitter 
Former Berekum Chelsea stopper Ernest Sowah was not sold to Asante Kotoko at the cost of GHC 100,000 as reported in the media, GHANASoccernet.com can exclusively reveal. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
